root.name: Bad Mojo
root.description: StoryYou take on the role of a corrupt scientist who is mysteriously transformed into a cockroach moments before you make your great escape.From there you navigate the filthy apartment, all the while taking care to stay alive.As you make your way through the labyrinthine environments, you start to piece together the missing parts of your cloudy past.The ending will vary depending on your final actions.ControlsCharacter control is solely based on the 4 directional arrow keys.
